mapper.select:
SELECT
,
FROM tb_health_care_sci_know
where SCIENCE_KNOWLEDGE_STATUS in (2,4,5)
where SCIENCE_KNOWLEDGE_STATUS in (1,2,3,5)
where SCIENCE_KNOWLEDGE_STATUS in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6)
order by itemUpdateAt desc
mapper.update: update tb_health_care_sci_know set VISIT_NUM = VISIT_NUM + 1 where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
